events.name: Clojure Lunch
events.description: Ruslan and Lucas will host a Clojure Lunch to talk about clojure over lunch.
events.location: Chillies, Clarke Quay Central, 6 Eu Tong Sen Street, #01-18 The Central Singapore 059817

events.name: Learn about Inbound Marketing & Why It's Important
events.description: [ What you will learn ] In this 2-hour workshop, learn the fundamentals of inbound marketing and why it has been the most popular marketing concept today. Specifically, you will learn: 。All facets of inbound marketing。Understand how to generate leads the inbound way。Learn to improve traffic with a limited marketing budget Register Here [ Who should join ] 。People who aspire to be a digital marketer。People who are interested to pick up skills in digital marketing。Aspiring entrepreneurs who want to launch their own product [ Workshop details ] 。Date: 30 Nov 16。Time: 3pm - 5pm。Venue: 43B Tanjong Pagar Road (level 3)。Price: SGD 15  Register Here *Admittance to the workshop is strictly for people who paid for the event only. [ Instructor ] Ruben started his career with Procter & Gamble now with The Hub Singapore. He is deeply passionate about marketing, consumers and new innovative products, with bias for growth. He helps startups grow and makes more amazing products by living by the principles of everything data-driven. ____________ Policy:ALPHA Camp reserves the right to cancel or postpone the event due to unforeseen circumstances. In the event that the workshop is cancelled or postponed, all paid participants will be informed via email and full-refund will be given. Thank you!
events.location: Alpha Camp, 43B Tanjong Pagar Road, Singapore

events.name: Advanced Appium (Mobile Apps Testing)
events.description: Hello hivemind, Get ready with your laptops!!! We are meeting again on 30th Nov at GovTech (Sandcrawler). Syam Sasi from GovTech continues to share his experience with us on advanced Appium concepts. Today, with so much of application development focussed on mobile applications, we need a lot of help & smart ways of testing our applications. This session we focus on: · Quick recap on Appium (for those who missed the last meetup) · User navigations (how to swipe, scroll, zoom in/out, etc) in a native app · Running automated tests using mobile browsers · Continuous Integration with Appium Agenda: 6.30 pm to 7.15 pm:  Food and Networking 7.15 pm to 7.45 pm:  Advanced Appium 7.45 pm to 9.00 pm:  Hands-on session Workshop Setup Steps: It would be superb if you can complete the below setup steps before the session begins: https://github.com/syamsasi99/vodQA_Appium_RobotFramework

events.name: Coaching night!
events.description:
How to improve code quality in your team?  Marc-Andre Langlais and Michael Bertrand from Epicoaching are team coaches and have plenty of good stories on how to carry change inside a team of developers.  They will discuss how to use tools and concepts such as TDD as a contributor to innovation and how innovative mindsets tie everything together. 

Schedule: == 7PM: pizzas (sponsored by Pivotal)== 7.30PM - 8.30PM: talk and questions
events.location: PayPal office in Suntec, 5 Temasek Blvd, #09-01 Suntec Tower Five, 038985 Nearest Mrt:Promenade(Yellow Line), Singapore

events.name: Learn how to build a chatbot on ioS
events.description: Learn the general techniques of implementing chatbots on ioS and work with natural language processing. Sign up here : http://bit.ly/2d6SNNZ[ Who should join ] 。People without coding experience but want to learn coding。Aspiring entrepreneurs who want to build their own app。People who are interested in learning more about chatbots and working with natural language processing [ What you will learn ] 。Basic iOS app development。Build a simple chat screen to talk to a chatbot AI using wit.ai [ Workshop details ] 。Date: 30 Nov。Time: 7.30pm - 9.30pm。Venue: 43B Tanjong Pagar Road (level 3)。Price: SGD 15 * Admittance to the workshop is strictly for people who paid for the event only.* * Please bring your own MacBook (updated to El Capitan) and install Xcode (at least version 8) before workshop. [ Instructor ] Kale TohSoftware Engineer, Singapore Tourism Board Over 7 years of software development experience. Previously iOS Development Instructor at ALPHA Camp and The Pragmatic Lab. Passionate in teaching and solving problems with code. ____________ Policy:1. ALPHA Camp reserves the right to cancel or postpone the event due to unforeseen circumstances. In the event that the workshop is cancelled or postponed, all paid participants will be informed via email and full-refund will be given. Thank you!
events.location: Alpha Camp, 43B Tanjong Pagar Road, Singapore
